title: Secure Authentication and Authorization Setup
summary: Implement secure login and multi-factor authentication for users.
description: Develop a secure and compliant user authentication mechanism featuring multi-factor authentication, encrypted credential storage, session management, and timeout controls. This will serve as the foundational layer ensuring that only authorized users can access the portal while maintaining compliance with banking security and privacy regulations.

title: Personalized Dashboard Design
summary: Build a dynamic dashboard showing personalized banking details and products.
description: Create a personalized dashboard that presents relevant financial information, product offerings, and services based on the individual user’s customer profile and eligibility. The dashboard should provide a clear overview of accounts, balances, and quick access options for actions while maintaining a simple, intuitive design for optimal user experience.

title: Responsive UI and Device Compatibility
summary: Design a responsive interface accessible across multiple devices.
description: Develop a responsive, mobile-first user interface optimized for consistent performance across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. The layout should automatically adapt to screen size while maintaining usability, accessibility, and consistent functionality.

title: Account Opening and Service Modification Flows
summary: Allow users to open accounts and modify services through the portal.
description: Implement guided workflows enabling customers to open new accounts or modify existing services with minimal input. Each step should be clear and concise, employing validation and auto-fill features for efficiency. The workflows must integrate with backend approval processes and provide status visibility to the user.

title: Document Upload and Application Draft Management
summary: Enable document uploads and save applications as drafts for later completion.
description: Develop functionality for users to securely upload necessary documents during account opening or service modification processes. Allow users to save draft applications, retrieve them later, and resume submission. Validate uploaded file types and sizes while ensuring encryption during transmission and storage.

title: Real-Time Tracking and Notifications
summary: Provide real-time request tracking and automated notifications.
description: Implement a communication system enabling users to track their submitted requests in real-time through a dedicated portal section. Automatically generate updates and notifications via email and in-app alerts when the status of a request changes, ensuring transparency throughout the process.

title: Interaction History and Audit Logging
summary: Maintain an interaction history and compliance-friendly audit trail.
description: Develop a comprehensive logging framework to record all user interactions, submissions, and updates. This includes visible transaction history for users and secure internal logs for auditing and regulatory compliance. Logs must capture timestamps, user details, and activity metadata while preserving data integrity and confidentiality.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the bank’s core systems.
description: Integrate the self-service portal with the bank’s existing core banking infrastructure to facilitate seamless data exchange. This includes synchronization of account data, service requests, and updates in real time while ensuring minimal latency, consistent accuracy, and secure communication between systems.

title: Portal Database Design and Optimization
summary: Develop an independent, high-performance database for portal operations.
description: Design and implement an independent database architecture for the portal that supports fast read-write operations, secure storage, and scalability. The portal database will synchronize with core banking data periodically, ensuring reliability, isolation of concerns, and uninterrupted performance during high traffic.

title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) Implementation
summary: Define and enforce access permissions based on user roles and profiles.
description: Implement a granular role-based access control mechanism to restrict user access to specific products, services, and system functions according to their profile and authorization level. Enforce segregation of rights to ensure customers, administrators, and employees interact only with appropriate features, enhancing data protection and governance compliance.
